name: Cirrus Aviation, Inc.
about: Cirrus Aviation, Inc., located at the Sarasota Bradenton International Airport in Sarasota, Florida, has been a leader in flight training since 1994. Known for its friendly staff and quality instruction, the school consistently produces safe and proficient pilots who have gone on to become airline pilots, aircraft owners, and recreational enthusiasts. The ideal training environment includes beautiful coastlines, year-round favorable weather, tower-controlled runways, and light commercial traffic. Utilizing strong syllabi created by industry leaders Cessna and King School, Cirrus Aviation offers comprehensive programs for both pleasure and career-oriented pilots. We build lasting relationships with our customers and ensure an excellent educational experience, making Cirrus Aviation the premier destination for future pilots.
